General.Name: IGB Bhd
General.Description: IGB Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in property investment, development, and management businesses in Malaysia. The company operates through five segments: Property Investment"Retail, Property Investment"Commercial, Property Development, Hotel, and Construction. It operates retail malls and office buildings; develops and sells condominiums, bungalows, linked houses, shop lots, and office suites; constructs civil and building projects; operates hotels; and provides education, and information and communication technology services, as well as sells and distributes utilities. The company is also involved in the integrated healthcare and wellness; aquaculture operation; food and beverage operation; leasing auditorium space for performing arts; research and development of automated facilities management solution system; management of real estate investment trust; and trading of building materials, as well as the management, operation, and maintenance of wastewater treatment plants. In addition, it offers money lending services; engineering and consultancy services for pure water and wastewater treatment plants, and related services; and management, building and maintenance, project management, and exhibition services. The company was formerly known as Goldis Berhad. IGB Berhad was incorporated in 2000 and is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
